title: Memorial
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, February 1951 until November 1951 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1951.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased from the artist for $200 and mailed to Carnegie Institute "as per instructions" on February 8, 1951. Payment of invoice from the artist to Mrs. Beal ("1 set - 16/40 - Vanity #2. /5 lithographs in color.") is dated February 12, 1951. Payment was acknowledged on February 19, 1951 (see curatorial file.) 
[2]. The set of lithographs were received at Carnegie Institute on February 19, 1951. It was accessioned on November 1, 1951.
